modal.title: Attention!
modal.text: Should the experiment be stopped as it is irreversible and may result in unpredictable consequences?

help.config: The Configuration parameter describes the input options of your model. Configure it in the 'config' parameter of swanlab.init. Click the icon to learn more.
help.summary: The Summary parameter describes the final results of the metrics you record. Click the icon to learn more.

chart.error: This chart is not displayed correctly.

line.error: The Chart cannot be displayed because the value of "{tag}" is type {type}, and Line Chart do not support displaying type {type}.
